product_name: Line Pollard's Paint Brush Adjustable Ski Poles
long_description: The Line Pollard's Paint Brush adjustable ski poles are the tools you need to launch tricks with signature style in the terrain park then plant turns in deep powder thanks to their adjustable length. Durable aluminum construction makes the poles feel light in hand. Sticky grip won't slip as you charge boxes, rails and kickers. 25mm strap features a rip-and-stick adjustment. Tabs on top of grips fit into your hands between your thumbs and first fingers and make 5-finger grabs a bit more manageable. When conditions change from packed to powder, switch out the smaller, 60mm baskets for larger, 90mm baskets by simply screwing them off the pole. Graphics on the Line Pollard's Paint Brush adjustable ski poles are designed by skier, artist and filmmaker Eric Pollard.
